fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a living player to reap the soul of, then deal an attack to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you reap the Soul of a player, you learn their role. You may then select one attribute from that role and add it to your own.
- Select 2 days at the beginning of the game. All Spirits cannot die at all during those days even through being voted, and will live without explanation.
